title: Period Close Checklist
description: Month/quarter/year-end close procedures covering cut-off, reconciliations, and approvals.

items.text: Confirm close calendar communicated and responsibilities assigned.
Verify user access reviews completed; sensitive roles limited.
Run AR ageing and agree post-period receipts to ensure revenue cut-off.
Review unmatched GRNs and AP accruals for completeness.
Complete bank reconciliations with outstanding items documented.
Reconcile key balance sheet accounts (payroll, VAT, CIT, accruals).
Compile list of manual journals requiring manager approval before posting.
Lock trial balance snapshot and archive supporting evidence.
Update close dashboard with status and ageing metrics.
Submit close package for Manager approval (HITL gate).
